alert.note: Alert for Defiance; Paulding; Putnam (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 5:27PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Defiance, northwestern Putnam and Paulding Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 527 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Antwerp to near Payne to near Monroeville. Movement was east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Paulding around 540 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Defiance. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for northwestern and west central Ohio.
